price: Una tarde fueron expuestos delante de él unos hermosos caballos,
arabic: إِذۡ عُرِضَ عَلَيۡهِ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ ٱلصَّٰفِنَٰتُ ٱلۡجِيَادُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: idh ʿuriḍa ʿalayhi bil-ʿashiyi al-ṣāfinātu al-jiyādu
